description:
Personal Finance Calculator by Kandy development is a collection of commonly used finance calculation.  It includes calculation features such as auto loan, mortgage, retirement, expense report, shopping discount, tips calculation that are typically used in daily personal finance calculation. 

Update in 1.0.3
-Added email function to some of the calculations that may require sharing
-Added Euro support
-Modified to support full landscape layout
-Include Australia Super Calculation

The auto loan features include loan payment calculation and comparison, and max car price affordability. 

The credit card calculation features include monthly payment and repayment period.

The mortgage loan features include fixed mortgage and comparison, ARM, mortgage refinance and etc. 

The retirement features include how much can you save, how much can you withdraw, 401k calculation and etc. 

It also features net worth calculation, monthly expense report, savings, salary conversion, tips and split calculation.
It is one-app that comes with a lot of features needed.  It is easy to use and easy to navigate.  All you need to do is entering the data in the text boxes, and press submit.
versionNote:
Update in 1.0.4
-Added <<Rate Us>> in the menu item
